monogr.title: Christians at the Heart of Islamic Rule: Church Life and Scholarship in ‘Abbasid Iraq

body.bibl: Accad, Martin. “The Ultimate Proof-Text: The Interpretation of John 20.17 in Muslim-Christian Dialogue (Second/Eighth–Eighth/Fourteenth Centuries).” In Christians at the Heart of Islamic Rule: Church Life and Scholarship in ‘Abbasid Iraq, edited by David Richard Thomas, 199–214.
